mapper.select: select from twb_ballot a where a.ballot_id = #{ballot_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.order_id
select from twb_ballot_question a where a.ballot_id =#{ballot_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.state='1' order by a.order_id
select from twb_ballot_answer a where a.question_id =#{question_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by a.order_id
select from twb_ballot_detail a where a.ballot_id =#{ballot_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.ip = #{ip}

SELECT a.question_id,a.answer_id, b.answer_total,a.cur_answer_total, round(cur_answer_total/IFNULL(b.answer_total,1)*100,2) answer_rate FROM (SELECT a.question_id,a.answer_id,SUM(1) cur_answer_total FROM twb_ballot_detail a WHERE a.ballot_id = #{ballot_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY a.question_id,a.answer_id) a, (SELECT a.question_id,SUM(1) answer_total FROM twb_ballot_detail a WHERE a.ballot_id = #{ballot_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY a.question_id) b WHERE a.question_id = b.question_id;
